title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014
yAxis: Share of the burger restaurant market
summary: This is a bar chart representing Burger Restaurant Chains in the x axis and Share of the burger restaurant market in the y axis.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is appeared to be the highest at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and lowest at Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
There is a difference of 26.1 between the maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Share of the burger restaurant market is 8.2.
The second highest Share of the burger restaurant market is appeared to be the Burger Restaurant Chains .
The difference of Share of the burger restaurant market between the highest and lowest Burger Restaurant Chains is 26.1.
Share of the burger restaurant market at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's is 34.3 , second place is  at 34.3, and thirdly is Wendy's at 13.9.
The average Share of the burger restaurant market in all 4 Burger Restaurant Chainss is 17.95.
